sn7.3:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn7.3:1.3: “bharadvajagotto brahmano kira samanassa gotamassa santike agarasma anagariyam pabbajito”ti kupito anattamano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam asabbhahi pharusahi vacahi akkosati paribhasati.
sn7.3:1.5: Atha kho asurindakabharadvajo brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn7.3:6.1: Evam vutte, asurindakabharadvajo brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn7.3:6.4: Annataro ca panayasma bharadvajo arahatam ahositi.
